item.title: Equation KaTeX
item.description: inline equation $\sum_i a_i$ display model $$\int g(x)$$ Integrate $$\int x^3 dx$$ $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$ fas $$\boxed{j=\begin{cases}f(x), &x>0\\g(x), &x<0\end{cases}}$$ dafdsa $\underbrace{a+b+c}_{\text{note}}$ $$x = \begin{cases} f(x)A, & x>B \\ g(x) & x<C \end{cases}$$ $$\begin{aligned} f(x)A, & x>B \\ g(x) & x<C \end{aligned}$$ $$ x = \begin{cases}a &\text{if } b \\c &\text{if } d\end{cases} $$ $$\tag{1}\boxed{j=\begin{cases}f(x), &x>0\\g(x), &x<0\end{cases}}$$
